special_text:
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy it for each card in your graveyard with the same name. You may choose new targets and/or modes for each copy.
[+2]: Mill four cards. You may return a card milled this way from your graveyard to your hand.
[-2]: Pina becomes a copy of a permanent card in your graveyard until end of turn.
[-X]: You may cast a copy of an instant or sorcery card in your graveyard with mana value X or less without paying its mana cost.
